spatialplanr 0.0.1.0001
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Function reference

    All functions

    SpatPlan_Apply_Cutoffs()
    Function to apply cutoffs to feature data
    SpatPlan_Convert_2PUs()
    Function to interpolate data onto Planning Units
    SpatPlan_Convert_PacificRobinson()
    Convert a region to Pacific-Centred Robinson Projection.
    SpatPlan_Convert_Regionalisation()
    Function to interpolate regionalisation data onto Planning Units
    SpatPlan_Create_Polygon()
    Function for creating polygon
    SpatPlan_Crop_AQM()
    Crop AquaMaps Data
    SpatPlan_Get_AquaMaps()
    Code to reduce AquaMaps to our requested species and area.
    SpatPlan_Get_Boundary()
    Get the boundary of the planning region.
    SpatPlan_Get_FishCost()
    Get fisheries cost layer.
    SpatPlan_Get_Geomorphic()
    Assign geomorphic features to each planning unit.
    SpatPlan_Get_MPAs()
    Get marine parks from the WDPA.
    SpatPlan_Get_PlanningUnits()
    Function to create square or heaxagonal planning units for your area of interest.
    SpatPlan_Get_TargetsIA()
    Calculate Inverse Area Targets
    SpatPlan_Match_IUCNRedList()
    Match Species to IUCN RedList
    SpatPlan_Match_Longhurst()
    Assign Longhurst Provinces to PUs
    SpatPlan_Match_Names()
    Substitute numbers for all_names in regionalisations
    SpatPlan_Plot_Comparison()
    Plot solution comparison
    SpatPlan_Plot_Cost()
    Plot cost
    SpatPlan_Plot_FeatureNo()
    Plot number of features
    SpatPlan_Plot_Longhurst()
    Plot Longhurst Provinces
    SpatPlan_Plot_MPAs()
    Plot MPAs
    SpatPlan_Plot_PUs()
    Plot Planning Units
    SpatPlan_Plot_Solution()
    Plot prioritizr solution
    SpatPlan_Replace_NAs()
    Remove NAs from spatial data using nearest neighbour
    SpatPlan_Scale_01()
    Scale spatial layers to between 0 and 1
    SpatPlan_fix_FBtype()
    A function to fix incorrect column types from fishbase and sealifebase
    SpatPlan_validate_FBNAs()
    Code to loop through and try and validate names with fishbase and sealifebase

    Developed by Jason Everett.
